description: Hike is along a mutliuse path (horses/bikes/hiking) that can become muddy in spring/fall/winter and after rain. Features the small Mima falls and views of Mt. St. Helene in far distance on a clear day.
directions: 1.	From I5 Take exit 95 toward Littlerock	0.2 mi2.	Merge onto Maytown Rd SW	2.9 mi3.	Continue on 128th Ave SW	0.8 mi4.	Turn left at Mima Rd SW	1.3 mi5.	Turn right at Bordeaux Rd SW	0.7 mi6.	Turn right at Marksman St SW	0.9 mi
title: Mima Falls
